meanings.definition: To clean with a vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent1: She hoovered the living room quickly.
meanings.sent3: The cat watched curiously as she hoovered around it.
meanings.sent4: The vacuum hoovered up all the dirt in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the vacuum hoovering was soothing.

meanings.sent1: He hoovered the entire house last weekend.
meanings.sent2: She hoovered the stairs before the guests arrived.
meanings.sent3: The robot hoovered the floor while everyone was out.
meanings.sent4: The vacuum cleaner hoovered up all the crumbs.
meanings.sent5: The noise of the vacuum hoovered echoed through the house.

meanings.definition: Having been cleaned with a vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent2: The hoovered carpet felt soft underfoot.
meanings.sent3: She admired the hoovered rug in the living room.
meanings.sent4: The hoovered area smelled fresh and clean.
meanings.sent5: The hoovered space was inviting and tidy.
